content.rendered:
Creator Alessandro Garramone

Directed by Nicola Prosatore

Written by Davide Bandiera. Alessandro Garramone

Cast Wanna Marchi( Self4 episodes, 2022 ). Stefania Nobile( Self4 episodes, 2022 ). Frank Gerrish( Various4 episodes, 2022 ). Joe Denti( Self4 episodes, 2022 ). Stefano Zurlo( Self4 episodes, 2022 ). Roberto Da Crema(3 episodes, 2022 ). Monica D’Angelo( Self3 episodes, 2022 ). Jimmy Ghione( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Sonia Battistuta( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Pierluigi Cananzi( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Valter Carbone( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Liborio Cataliotti( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Mario Pacheco Do Nascimento( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Raimondo Lagostena( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Milva Magliano( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Giorgio Mendella( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Maurizio Pagliari( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Primo Tortini( Self1 episode, 2022 )

Language Italian

Producers Gabriele Immirzi

Production Fremantle.

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 4
